attributes.action: establish a Referendum on the "Reform" treaty on the European constitution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The European Union Constitutional treaty of 2007 would establish the EU as a distinct and sovereign entity. This is a novelty!

The 'Reformed' treaty (2007) maintains the essential principles of the putative constitutional treaty which was rejected by voters in France and the Netherlands. 

Since a British referendum on the  predecessor treaty was "promised" and the present document conserves that document's main content, its ratification should not proceed without that promise being fulfilled.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
